javascript Axios

parameters.name: class-value
parameters.description: Value of the class (eg. Plan number, group number)

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The primary identifier of the insured and the coverage

parameters.name: payor
parameters.description: The identity of the insurer or party paying for services

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The kind of coverage (health plan, auto, Workers Compensation)

class.name: Full Coverage: Medical, Dental, Pharmacy, Vision, EHC
